text: Sadly I don't have access to a console that can play Megaman 10 so I will never know how good it is, but I've played from 1-5 and 9, personnally 9 is my favorite followed by 3 and then 2
author: irikan280

text: 3/1/2/9/4/7/6/5/10/8 personally, 10 was way worse IMO than 9 in every regard pretty much, but it's just an opinion, so yeah. 8 had some of the worst voice acting in the history of mankind and it didn't feel that fun to me, so it's the bottom of the pile. Something was not right about it, can't quite put my finger on it. I do agree that 1 is pretty great though.

author: Boyce18

text:
Since I just finished the entire playlist again and I know for a fact that Supra's gonna have some more questions when he releases the next x00 video, I thought it would be fun to get in on that while we wait to see what the next big song's gonna be. So let me ask everyone... what do you think SupraDarky looks like?
Because I imagine a former nerd who decided to buff up and become an over-muscled bad ass. Just one who still wears glasses and loves tenderly caring for small animals.

text:
This is the first level I played when I bought this game. I remember smiling when I heard the part at 0:32 because I knew I was probably in for a great soundtrack, and I was right. Awesome game overall.

Don't expect the next upload too﻿ soon, I'll be very busy during the upcoming days with limited access to my main computer. I'll do a special video like the other x00 uploads, but nothing too crazy.
